**ISC Scientists and Their Contributions and List of Abbreviations to be Studied**

|**Scientist**|**Contribution**|
| :-: | :-: |
|Oparin|Coacervates, Conditions on primitive earth were favourable for chemical evolution|
|Stanley Miller & Harold Urey|Recreated probable conditions on primitive earth|
|Ernst Haeckel|Proposed the recapitulation theory|
|Charles Darwin|Natural Selection|
|Lamarck|Inheritance of acquired characters|
|Hugo de Vries|Mutation|
|T. R. Malthus|Theory of Human Population Growth/ Essays on population|
|Alec Jeffrey|DNA fingerprinting|
|Temin and Baltimore|Reverse transcription|
|Jacob, Monad and Lwoff|Proposed Lac operon|
|Watson and Crick|Structure of DNA|
|Nirenberg and Khorana|Genetic code|
|Benzer|Cistron, recon, muton|
|Gregor Mendel|Father of genetics|
|Sutton and Boveri|Chromosomal theory of inheritance|
|Hugo de Vries, Correns and Tschermack|Rediscovered Mendelism|
|T H Morgan|Linkage|
|P Maheshwari|Plant tissue culture|
|Henking|Discovered X-chromosome|
|F. Miescher|Isolated nucleic acid from pus cells, called Nuclein|
|Chargaff|Rule of equivalence in DNA structure|
|F. Griffith|Transformation in bacteria|
|Avery, MacLeod and McCarty|DNA is the genetic material|
|Hershey and Chase|DNA is the genetic material|
|Meselson and Stahl|Semi-conservative replication of DNA|
|G. Gamow|Triplet nature of codons|
|S Ochoa|Discovered polynucleotide phosphorylase|
|Wallace|Divided the Earth into biogeographical regions|
|M S Swaminathan|Green revolution in India|
|H Boyer|Discovered Restriction Enzyme|
|S Cohen|Method to transfer plasmid DNA in host cells|
|R. Mishra|Father of Indian Ecology|
|E. Wilson|Coined the term Biodiversity|
|P Ehrlich|Rivet Popper Hypothesis|
|Sanger|DNA/Protein sequencing|
|Beijerinck|Contagium vivum fluidum|
|Carl Woese|Three domains of life|
|Engelmann|Action spectrum of photosynthesis|
|Ernst Mayr|Biological species concept|
|F.F. Blackman|Law of limiting factor|
|F W Went|Isolated Auxins|
|Farmer and Moore|Discovered meiosis|
|G.N. Ramachandran|Analysis of Protein structure|
|George Palade|Discovered ribosomes|
|Huxley and Niedergerke|Sliding filament theory|
|Ivanowsky|Discovered Tobacco Mosaic Virus|
|Karl Landsteiner|Blood groups|
|Katherine Esau|Anatomy of plants|
|Peter Mitchell|Chemiosmotic coupling hypothesis|
|Priestley|Plants restore oxygen in the air|
|Robert Brown|Discovered nucleus|
|Singer and Nicolson|Proposed fluid mosaic model of plasma membrane|
|Sutherland|Cyclic AMP as second messenger|
|T. O. Diener|Discovered viroids|
|Thomas Addison|Father of endocrinology|
|Van Neil|Oxygen released during photosynthesis comes from water|
|W. M. Stanley|Crystallised TMV|
|Waldeyer|Coined the term chromosome|
|Whittaker|Five kingdoms of life|
|William Harvey|Discovered circulatory system|
